page.title: 06SPORTS IN STRACHAN
page.content:
Sample of 40 out of 60 households.
51 people go swimming regularly. 19 " play golf " 5 " play football " 1 person plays volley ball. 3 people play rugby; 9 go jogging. 3 do athletics;20 do keep fit; 48 go walking or climbing; 10 play squash; 4 play badminton; 3 go sailing; 12 go skiing; 55 people enjoy watching sport of some kind. Other sports participated in are power lifting,shooting,fishing,darts, tennis,pool,wind surfing,water skiing, curling,highland dancing,clay pigeon shooting,table tennis,diving,bowling and canoeing.
